text: hi I'm actor and writer Stephen Lang I'm
here shooting a promo for the Terra Nova
marathon which airs Sunday July seventh
on the science channel now you might be
asking hey actor and writer Stephen Lang
is there any science in it like at all
well yes actually terra nova is science
fiction it's got future technology and
time travel so there's some science
right there but science fiction is also
about something else it's about seeing
the world as it was reflecting the world
as it is and imagining the world as it
could be and at its essence isn't that
what science itself is all about I hope
you agree and I hope you enjoy Terranova
on science the terra nova marathon
sunday july seventh all day on science
